short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take your browsing experience to the next level with GrapeTab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Upgrade your New Tab homepage to a stylish, minimalist design with GrapeTab, giving you instant access to your preferred websites.

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing the 'GrapeTab' extension and setting the New Tab to that powered by Yahoo Search, Terms of Use (https://www.grapetab.com/terms.html) and Privacy Policy (https://www.grapetab.com/privacy.html).

GrapeTab enhances your browsing by offering immediate access to sites like Facebook, Amazon, WhatsApp, and more.

The AI shortcut to ChatGPT provides quick and easy access to its conversational skills, speeding up and streamlining interactions. This feature enhances the user experience by simplifying the use of AI for information collection, creativity, problem-solving, and more.

Terms of Use: https://www.grapetab.com/terms.html
Privacy Policy: https://www.grapetab.com/privacy.html
Contact Us: https://www.grapetab.com/contact.html
